docs.lead_paragraph: The state is adopting a plan that would seek arbitrarily to hold down the rise in hospital costs by about 25 per cent by limiting Medicaid and insurance payments.

headline.main: STATE SETS LIMIT ON HOSPITAL COSTS; Would Cut Rise for Insured and Medicaid Care to 12% Instead of Potential 16%

docs.snippet: The state is adopting a plan that would seek arbitrarily to hold down the rise in hospital costs by about 25 per cent by limiting Medicaid and insurance payments.
